entry.title: Your 2020 Democratic National Convention questions, answered

media:group.media:title: Your 2020 Democratic National Convention questions, answered
media:group.media:description:
The 2020 Democratic National Convention kicked off this week, with the Republican National Convention to follow next. These events will look very different than years past due to coronavirus. Chris Cillizza, answered your questions on the conventions.
Be sure to tune into CNN for in depth 2020 DNC coverage from 8pm-2amEST.
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #DNC20

entry.title: Daughter of Trump supporter that died from Covid-19 speaks out

media:group.media:title: Daughter of Trump supporter that died from Covid-19 speaks out
media:group.media:description: Kristin Urquiza, daughter of Mark Urquiza who passed away from Covid-19, shared her father's story and criticized President Donald Trump's coronavirus response in a speech during the 2020 Democratic National Convention. She speaks with CNN's John Berman. #CNN #News

entry.title: Enten: 2020 election tighter than folks think. Here's why

media:group.media:title: Enten: 2020 election tighter than folks think. Here's why
media:group.media:description:
Watch more 2020 election videos here: https://cnn.it/3iM1ESH
CNN's Harry Enten says data from five important swing states show that presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden's lead over President Donald Trump is tighter than national polls are showing, but the former vice president is in better shape than Hillary Clinton was in 2016. #HarryEnten #2020Election #CNN

entry.title: Daughter: Trusting Trump on Covid-19 cost my father's life

media:group.media:title: Daughter: Trusting Trump on Covid-19 cost my father's life
media:group.media:description:
Watch full speeches and more DNC content here: https://cnn.it/3iM1ESH
Kristin Urquiza, daughter of Mark Urquiza who died of Covid-19, shared her father's story and slammed President Donald Trump's coronavirus responses in a speech during the 2020 Democratic National Convention.
#DNC #CNN #News

entry.title: Bernie Sanders tells supporters to vote Biden during DNC speech

media:group.media:title: Bernie Sanders tells supporters to vote Biden during DNC speech
media:group.media:description:
Watch the full speech here: https://cnn.it/3iM1ESH
Speaking at the 2020 Democratic National Convention, Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-VT) explained why he's supporting Joe Biden saying all Americans across the political spectrum need to help Biden beat President Donald Trump in the 2020 presidential election. #Bernie #DNC #CNN

entry.title: Tapper: This is not the kind of thing you hear first ladies talk about

media:group.media:title: Tapper: This is not the kind of thing you hear first ladies talk about
media:group.media:description:
Watch full speeches and more DNC content here: https://cnn.it/3iM1ESH
CNN's Jake Tapper, Dana Bash, Abby Phillip and others discuss Michelle Obama's speech at the DNC.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Watch Michelle Obama use Trump's words against him at DNC

media:group.media:title: Watch Michelle Obama use Trump's words against him at DNC
media:group.media:description:
Watch the full speech here: https://cnn.it/3iM1ESH
During her speech at the 2020 Democratic National Convention, former First Lady Michelle Obama says that President Donald Trump is in over his head and can't deal with the crises the country is facing while making the case that Americans should vote for Joe Biden in the 2020 US presidential election. #MichelleObama #DNC #CNN

entry.title: John King breaks down how coronavirus may affect the presidential election

media:group.media:title: John King breaks down how coronavirus may affect the presidential election
media:group.media:description:
CNN's John King examines how the politics of the coronavirus pandemic may impact the presidential election as the nation averages over 50,000 cases of Covid-19 per day.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Birx says she wishes US started with lockdown like Italy

media:group.media:title: Birx says she wishes US started with lockdown like Italy
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Erin Burnett Dr. Sanjay Gupta respond to a statement from Dr. Deborah Birx, a top White House coronavirus official, in which she says she wishes the US had more stringent lockdown measures in place at the beginning of the pandemic, similar to Italy.
#CNN #NEWS

entry.title: Wolf presses Kushner: 1,000 deaths a day isn't success, right?

media:group.media:title: Wolf presses Kushner: 1,000 deaths a day isn't success, right?
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Wolf Blitzer talks to President Trump's senior adviser and son-in-law Jared Kushner
#CNN #News

entry.title: The DNC will look a lot different this year

media:group.media:title: The DNC will look a lot different this year
media:group.media:description:
The 2020 Democratic National Convention is this week, and you can expect it to look entirely different in the Covid-19 era. Chris Cillizza is joined by David Axelrod, a CNN senior political commentator and former senior adviser to President Barack Obama, to answer your questions ahead of this unprecedented event.
Be sure to tune into CNN for in depth 2020 DNC coverage from 8pm-2amEST.
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #DNC2020

entry.title: Rep. Adam Schiff: This is a shocking betrayal of our democracy

media:group.media:title: Rep. Adam Schiff: This is a shocking betrayal of our democracy
media:group.media:description: Rep. Adam Schiff (D-CA) says the emergency needs of the US Postal Service must be addressed, and accuses President Donald Trump of not wanting to improve the function of the USPS in an attempt to disenfranchise voters. #CNN #News

entry.title: Stelter: Trump eroding Americans' confidence in voting system

media:group.media:title: Stelter: Trump eroding Americans' confidence in voting system
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brian Stelter says President Trump is chipping away at the confidence Americans have in the voting system. #CNN #News

entry.title: Mark Meadows pressed on Trump's false claims of mail-in voter fraud

media:group.media:title: Mark Meadows pressed on Trump's false claims of mail-in voter fraud
media:group.media:description: White House chief of staff Mark Meadows discusses President Trump's position on mail-in voting and absentee voting, as the US Postal Service warns that it will struggle to process the volume of ballots it will receive this year with the coronavirus pandemic in the majority of states across the US.
